column6:
The space-faring Fantastic Four discover an amazing new planet! One race of aliens rules another on the surface of this strange world, but in space, things are not always as they appear. High adventure, super hero action and science fiction collide in this tale of a world gone bonkers!,2006,6
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column7: | Fantastic Four | Human Torch | Invisible Woman | Mr. Fantastic | Thing
column8: | penciller:Juan Santa Cruz | writer:Justin Gray | colorist:Lee Loughridge | letterer:Dave Sharpe | penciller (cover):David Williams
